name: GOAL
description: This table contains data on discrete goals (IGO) records associated with a patient.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the goal record.

columns.name: GOAL_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the goal type associated with this goal.

columns.name: GOAL_TYPE_ID_GOAL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the goal type record.

columns.name: PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the problem linked to this goal.

columns.name: DELETED_YN
columns.description: Determines if this goal has been deleted.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: This column holds the display name of this goal.

columns.name: GOAL_DESC_ID
columns.description: This column holds the goal description note's ID.

columns.name: EVALUATION_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This column holds the evaluation note ID for this goal.

columns.name: GOAL_TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the goal template used to create this record.

columns.name: GOAL_TEMPLATE_CDR
columns.description: This column stores contact date real of the goal template contact associated with this goal, stored in Epic's DTE format.

columns.name: HH_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The associated HH/HSPC episode ID for a care plan goal.
